text: Light Years is the seventh studio album by Australian singer Kylie Minogue. It was released on 25 September 2000 by Parlophone Records. The album contains five singles, "Spinning Around", "On a Night Like This", the duet "Kids" with Robbie Williams, "Please Stay" and "Your Disco Needs You". The album reached number one on the Australian charts. == Track listing == == Other websites == *Light Years on Kylie Minogue's official website Category:2000 albums Category:Kylie Minogue albums Category:Dance-pop albums
title: Light Years (Kylie Minogue album)
